dt: {bc}a hormone or hormonal agent that promotes flowering

et: The Russian term was apparently introduced by the Soviet Armenian plant physiologist Mixail Xristoforovič Čajlaxjan (1902-91) in an article published in 1936 in the {it}Doklady Akademii Nauk SSSR/Comptes rendus de l'Académie des Sciences de l'URSS.{/it} An English version of the article, entitled "New facts in support of the hormonal theory of plant development," was published in vol. 13 (1936) of the {it}Doklady,{/it} pp. 79-83.
shortdef: a hormone or hormonal agent that promotes flowering
